about_the_game:
Welcome to Final Dash, the electrifying platformer that takes you on an unforgettable journey through extraordinary worlds! Dive into a fast-paced experience filled with unique obstacles and breathtaking landscapes.

In Final Dash, not only will you face meticulously designed challenges, but you'll also have the chance to create your own levels using our intuitive editor. Unleash your creativity and build amazing worlds that will challenge your friends and the community at large!

Explore captivating environments, from futuristic landscapes to vibrant fantasy realms. Each level is meticulously crafted to provide visually stunning experiences and engaging gameplay that will test your reflexes and skills.

Moreover, in Final Dash, the community is at the heart of the experience. Share your creations with other players, play community-made levels, and compete for top scores on global leaderboards. The fun and excitement never end in Final Dash!

Are you ready for the ultimate challenge? Get ready to run, jump, and soar to greatness in Final Dash!

name: Final Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INtel Core i3 (8th Gen)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Introducing Final Dash, the thrilling platformer where you'll embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through stunning worlds! Jump into fast-paced challenges, create your own levels, and compete with friends. Are you ready to dash to victory?
